Similarly, program2 uses a DP that runs in O(m * |p|) and m=40000, and |p| is the number of palindromic numbers up to 40000. How many are there? The palindromic numbers up to 40000:

   - 3-digit: 9*10=90 (101,111,...,191,202,...,999? but 40000 is 4-digit, so we go up to 40000)
